content: Is spring going by so fast that you have very little spring cleaning to show for it? The right vacuum cleaner can give you the proper motivation to tidy up a bit. You wouldn't want your home to look like a mess for guests of your weekly Game of Thrones potluck dinners. While a robot vacuum can get the job done, a traditional Dyson upright vacuum on sale right now will help you take care of more messes in harder to reach nooks and crannies.  Tackle those messes after you save $110 on a Dyson Light Ball multi-floor bagless vacuum at Walmart today. That's a new upright vacuum for $239, and the closest comparable model on Amazon is only available for its full price of $389.99. Just keep in mind that the only available color on sale at Walmart is blue in case that doesn't vibe with your home's color palette. SEE ALSO: 7 of the best Dyson vacuums that will (hopefully) make all your cleaning dreams come true You won't procrastinate anymore on your spring cleaning list with this Dyson by your side. Since it's multi-floor, it will seal in the suction on living room carpets and hard kitchen floors and clean up any mess with stiff nylon bristles. You'll also vacuum nearly everywhere thanks to the Light Ball design that helps it maneuver into tighter spaces. The wand and hose attachments also make it convenient to clean the areas of your home that you always kind of forget about until you look up and see a bunch of cobwebs one day. And since it's bagless, it only takes the push of a button to release and dump the dirt and dust. If you have to deal with allergies, the entire vacuum uses HEPA filtration to keep allergens and bacteria trapped inside. A good vacuum is a key tool to finally get your home ready for guests, so a $110 discount on a Dyson Light Ball vacuum will help you check off another item on the old to-do list.  Image: Walmart Dyson Light Ball mult-floor bagless upright vacuum — $239 See Details

Dyson Light Ball multi-floor vacuum is on sale for $110 off at Walmart

Share
Tweet
What's This?
Just to let you know, if you buy something featured here, Mashable might earn an affiliate commission.
By Ryan LakichMashable Deals2019-04-25 17:53:34 UTC

Is spring going by so fast that you have very little spring cleaning to show for it? The right vacuum cleaner can give you the proper motivation to tidy up a bit. You wouldn't want your home to look like a mess for guests of your weekly Game of Thrones potluck dinners. While a robot vacuum can get the job done, a traditional Dyson upright vacuum on sale right now will help you take care of more messes in harder to reach nooks and crannies. 

Tackle those messes after you save $110 on a Dyson Light Ball multi-floor bagless vacuum at Walmart today. That's a new upright vacuum for $239, and the closest comparable model on Amazon is only available for its full price of $389.99. Just keep in mind that the only available color on sale at Walmart is blue in case that doesn't vibe with your home's color palette.

SEE ALSO: 7 of the best Dyson vacuums that will (hopefully) make all your cleaning dreams come true

You won't procrastinate anymore on your spring cleaning list with this Dyson by your side. Since it's multi-floor, it will seal in the suction on living room carpets and hard kitchen floors and clean up any mess with stiff nylon bristles. You'll also vacuum nearly everywhere thanks to the Light Ball design that helps it maneuver into tighter spaces. The wand and hose attachments also make it convenient to clean the areas of your home that you always kind of forget about until you look up and see a bunch of cobwebs one day. And since it's bagless, it only takes the push of a button to release and dump the dirt and dust. If you have to deal with allergies, the entire vacuum uses HEPA filtration to keep allergens and bacteria trapped inside.

A good vacuum is a key tool to finally get your home ready for guests, so a $110 discount on a Dyson Light Ball vacuum will help you check off another item on the old to-do list. 




Dyson Light Ball mult-floor bagless upright vacuum — $239
See Details
